awards.description: DESCRIPTION:THIS AGREEMENT PROVIDES ASSISTANCE TO THE PUEBLO OF POJOAQUE TO BUILD ITS CAPACITY TO ADMINISTER ENVIRONMENTAL PROGRAMS ON INDIAN LANDS. ACTIVITIES:SPECIFICALLY, THE RECIPIENT WILL BUILD CAPACITY OF OFFICE STAFF TO LEARN AND ADDRESS ENVIRONMENTAL ISSUES, PROVIDE OUTREACH, IMPLEMENT SOLID WASTE MANAGEMENT PRACTICES AND STRATEGIES TO PREVENT ILLEGAL DUMPING, AND TRAINING.SUBRECIPIENT:NO SUBAWARDS ARE INCLUDED IN THIS ASSISTANCE AGREEMENT.OUTCOMES:QUARTERLY PROGRESS REPORTS, ANNUAL FINAL FINANCIAL REPORT (FFR), QUALITY MANAGEMENT PLAN (QMP), AND GIS/GPS QUALITY ASSURANCE PROGRAM PLAN (QAPP). THE INTENDED BENEFICIARY IS THE PUEBLO OF POJOAQUE.

PROJECT TITLE: PUEBLO OF POJOAQUE TRANSPORTATION PROGRAM FUNDING FY 2024 :::: PROJECT DESCRIPTION: ALL TRANSPORTATION FUNDING PROVIDED BY FHWA TO PUEBLO OF POJOAQUE UNDER THE FHWA OTT PROGRAM AGREEMENT FOR FY24

PROJECT TITLE: PUEBLO OF POJOAQUE TRANSPORTATION PROGRAM FUNDING FY 2024 :::: PROJECT DESCRIPTION: ALL TRANSPORTATION FUNDING PROVIDED BY FHWA TO PUEBLO OF POJOAQUE UNDER THE FHWA OTT PROGRAM AGREEMENT FOR FY24
